recipe_name: Peach Pie the Old Fashioned Two Crust Way
ingredients: 1 (14.1 ounce) package pastry for a double-crust 9-inch pie, 1  egg, beaten, 5 cups sliced peeled peaches, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 1 cup white sugar,   +   1/2 cup all-purpose flour,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon,   +   1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg,   +   1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 tablespoons butter
nutrition: Total Fat 20g 25%, Saturated Fat 6g 31%, Cholesterol 31mg 10%, Sodium 358mg 16%, Total Carbohydrate 59g 21%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 30g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 36mg 180%, Calcium 22mg 2%, Iron 2mg 11%, Potassium 81mg 2%
